name: F3
description:
Simulation
  • 6 Levels
  • 4 Object Effects
  • 4 (Hidden) Side-Effects
  • (Random) music via computoser.com and DarkAudacity
  • Randomly picked / generated effects / side-effects
  • Some buggy Side-Effects
  • Easter-eggs
Controls
  • Mouse buttons to do things
  • R to restart the whole game
  • ESC to skip tutorials (works sometimes...)

Made for GM48 - 41 in 2 days.
